summary: Mobile-first songwriting and collaboration app (LioCollyVibeThunder) delivered as a mobile web app, with an additional goal to package/wrap it for distribution on Google Play and potentially the Apple App Store via native wrappers.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first product focused on emerging artists/bedroom musicians; keep core features free and accessible.
Combine writing tools with built-in collaboration network (social songwriting experience).
Plan for app-store distribution via wrapper approach (e.g., Android TWA/WebView and iOS native wrapper) while keeping the core app as a mobile web app.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- App logo mark: microphone + lightning motif, flat vector style (app-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Mobile hero/banner illustration: songwriting notebook + phone + waveform, warm modern palette (hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 6 small monochrome line icons (lyrics, template, rhyme, record, upload, message) (feature-icons.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-first UI shell for LioCollyVibeThunder with a consistent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) applied across all pages.
Implement Internet Identity sign-in and a logged-in session state that gates creation/editing actions (lyrics, profiles, uploads, messaging) while still allowing limited browsing where appropriate.
Frontend: Build artist profile screens (create/edit my profile, view another artist profile) and a collaborator discovery screen with filtering by genre/tag.
Frontend: Provide a lyric editor experience optimized for mobile (title + rich textarea/monospace editor), plus a library view to organize and open saved lyrics.

Implement rhyme assistance and song templates without external APIs: provide a templates picker (e.g., verse/chorus/bridge structures) and a basic rhyme suggestion tool based on a bundled word list and simple suffix/ending matching.
Add voice note recording for melody ideas using browser recording (MediaRecorder): allow users to record, playback, name, and save voice notes associated with a lyric or as standalone items.
Add song snippet uploads: allow users to upload a short audio file, add a title/description/genres, and publish it for others to view on the uploaderâ€™s profile.
Implement direct messaging between creators: backend stores conversations/messages; frontend provides an inbox, conversation view, and composer to message another creator from their profile.

Add a dedicated in-app Help / Install page that explains (in English) how users can install LioCollyVibeThunder on iOS and Android from the browser, and clarifies that App Store / Play Store listings require separate native packaging outside this web app build.
Convert the web app into a Progressive Web App (PWA) by adding a web app manifest, required icon assets, and appropriate HTML meta/link tags so the app can be installed on mobile devices.
Ensure required generated brand images are present as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and are used where referenced in the UI (logo in header and hero banner on discovery page).

new_feature_requests.summary: Lyrics writing editor with save/organize functionality
Voice note recording for melody ideas
Backend: Add persistent data models and CRUD endpoints for artist profiles including display name, bio, genres/tags, and optional links/handles.
Backend: Implement lyrics management allowing a signed-in user to create, edit, list, and delete lyric documents; include metadata such as title, created/updated timestamps, and optional tags.
Package/wrap the existing mobile web app for app store distribution (Android Play Store and iOS App Store via native wrapper).
